column5: Well just a quick update on my wife... Seems now she has to go through Radiation treatment to try to get rid of the dam Cancer.. Seems that they still found some in the limpnodes(spelling) then after that see how it is then back in for more Chemo.. Sorry for the rant.
Rant all you want Kelvin.. Rant all you want.

I as well as others im sure, are praying for her wellnes. I said it once, I said it twice, If theres any thing you need my friend dont hesitate to call and ask. And I do mean it sincerely. My father never had a fighting chance, your better half does. We are here for you if need so, Kelvin. Even if its a shoulder bud
fingers crossed from here loonie and hope your wife kicks the C to the curb for good.  WB
Kelvin, i just happen to have a few pounds of prayers left for you. I will send them to you right now. Keep the faith buddy  Paul
Kelvin, I am so sorry to hear this. I will be praying for your whole family. Godspeed!
My prayers also
Positive thoughts coming your way Kelvin. This disease can be beat!
Kelvin I am sorry to here this I hope she can kick it again we will be thinking of her.
It's a tough fight Kelvin, but we're all pulling for your wife.
Not fair,not fair at all. Prayers sent her way.
Kelvin, rant away my friend. If you are ever in need of an ear or just someone to have a beer, just let me know...
I got a few pounds of prayers lying around also...will send them up right away !
Prayers for you and all the families here battling illnesses, seems to be way too many lately.
hope things turn out ok !!..with all the OFC people pulling for her,it will be...

Do you remember back in the 60's when they found a vacine for polio? you do not hear of polio today. I pray that they would find a cure/vacine for cancer. BUT do they want a cure for cancer?  How much money would the doctors, hospitals, drug companies and research would loss.  Cancer is BIG money.  But we need to pray for a cure.
positive thoughts my man..We will send lots your way...Let u sknow if you need anything im sure we can all help out one way or another..
Kelvin I am sorry to hear this and I will be thinking of her kicking this one as well. Our thoughts are with you and your family.
Prayers sent your wifes way Kelvin.  That wasn't a rant btw. People need to vent every once in awhile.  Stay strong.
Wishing all the best
Thanks everyone for their prayers.. Well my wife starts Radiation Treatment tomorrow.. 10 rounds in 10 days... Going to be a tough battle.. Going to beat this thing...
She is going to beat this Kelvin. Thoughts and prayers for a successful treatment and recovery.  Paul
